minimal: Added option to rerun the onboarding tour

full.title: System Theme Preference Support
full.description: Before a user selects a theme manually, KroniCode now uses the system’s dark/light preference for its initial appearance.

full.title: Rerun the Onboarding Tour
full.description: Users can now restart the onboarding tour at any time via the tray menu.

full.title: Splash screen
full.description: KroniCode now displays a loading screen while the app initializes, providing a smoother startup experience.

full.title: Board Key Selection
full.description: Added a dropdown to select which board the ticket belongs to. Now users only need to choose a board and enter the ticket number.

full.title: Recent Ticket Suggestions
full.description: KroniCode now shows the 5 most recently used tickets as clickable suggestions to quickly populate the ticket input field.

full.title: Release Notes Separated by Type
full.description: KroniCode now shows release notes grouped by category, making it easier to scan new features, fixes, and improvements.

full.title: Bugfix: Onboarding Tour
full.description: The Onboarding tour was not correctly highlighting elements - this has been fixed.

full.title: Guided Onboarding Tour
full.description: Added a guided tour to onboard users with the app and it's functions.

full.title: Auto Reminder Pause Controls
full.description: You can now pause auto reminders! Choose to pause for 15 minutes, 1 hour, the rest of the day, or indefinitely — all from the tray menu for quick access.

full.title: Logged Time Display
full.description: You can now view your total time logged for today and the current week.

full.title: Added dark mode
full.description: You can switch between light and dark themes in Settings.

full.title: Added new setting - Boot with system
full.description: If checked, Kronicode will start with the system on boot.

full.title: Added a new tray menu display - last logged
full.description: The tray now displays the time of your last successful time log.

full.title: Added an Update progress display
full.description: When updates are checked/found, etc, the information is displayed in a toast for user quality-of-life. There's even a progress bar :)

full.title: Added error boundary
full.description: Any unexpected errors now gracefully show you the big "OH NO!" screen.

full.title: Updated message displays
full.description: Success and error messages now appear in a sleek toast instead of inline.

full.title: Removed tray menu option - "Show App"
full.description: This redundant option has been removed to simplify the tray menu.

full.title: Added Setup Wizard
full.description: New users are guided through a simple setup wizard to securely add their Jira and Tempo credentials.

full.title: Added Time Logging Interface
full.description: A streamlined UI for quickly logging time against Jira issues, including saved credentials and preferences.

full.title: Secure Credentials
full.description: API tokens and preferences are stored securely using the system's keychain via Keytar, improving privacy and persistence.

full.title: Added a tray menu
full.description: Enables users quick access to certain menu options through the tray interface.

full.title: Added the settings page
full.description: A streamlined UI for quick access preferences.

full.title: Added auto updating
full.description: Streamlined the update process by automatically downloading and installing new updates.

full.title: Added release notes
full.description: A UI display of new features/bug fixes/quality of life improvements.
